title: What It's Like To Be A Black Doctor And Nurse Right Now
description: Black Americans are facing two crises: a pandemic that has an outsize impact on their community, and decades of police brutality that have sparked protests nationwide.
itunes:title: What It's Like To Be A Black Doctor And Nurse Right Now
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, Anna Rothschild
itunes:subtitle: Black Americans are facing two crises: a pandemic that has an outsize impact on their community, and decades of police brutality that have sparked protests nationwide.
